title: Executive Order 5490-Power-Site Restoration No. 453
content: So much of the orders of November 3, 1909, creating Temporary Power-Site Withdrawal No. 47, and July 2, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 47, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 13 S., R. 3 W., sec. 27, SE. ¼ SW. ¼, S. ½ SE. ¼;                             sec. 33, S. ½ SW. ¼, NE. ¼ SE. ¼, S. ½ SE. ¼;                             sec. 34, N. ½ N. ½.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5490-Power-Site Restoration No. 453 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372979
